name: Heaven Forest - VR MMO
description: The pressing human questions about life depend directly on our attitudes toward the universe. You'll find the answers you're searching for through a series of reasonings and clues during your journey in this game as well as in your own life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 570 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: The game runs even without VR devices
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Quad-Core i5 or AMD equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 670 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: The game runs even without VR devices
